## R-packages

```{r, eval=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)
```


## Import data
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Read mapping results
df <- read.delim("data/tax_complete.csv",
                      sep = ",",
                      header = TRUE,
                      quote = "\"",
                      fill = TRUE,
                      check.names = FALSE,
                      stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

df_bac <- df %>% filter(Kingdom == "Bacteria")
```


# Novelty Calculations
```{r, eval=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}

Novelty <- df_bac %>%
  group_by(Phylum) %>%
  summarize("New genera"= uniqueN(Genus[grepl("AsCoM", Genus)]),
            "New families"= uniqueN(Family[grepl("AsCoM", Family)]),
            "New orders"= uniqueN(Order[grepl("AsCoM", Order)]),
            "New classes"= uniqueN(Class[grepl("AsCoM", Class)]))%>%
  gather(2:5, key = "Taxonomic_rank", value = "Counts")%>%
    mutate(Taxonomic_rank=factor(Taxonomic_rank, levels=c("New classes","New orders","New families","New genera"))) %>%
  filter(Counts>0)
```


## Plot histogram
```{r, eval=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
p1 <- ggplot(data=Novelty, aes(x=Phylum, y=Counts, fill=Taxonomic_rank)) +
  theme_bw() +
  geom_bar(color="black",stat="identity",position = "identity", width=0.8) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust=0.5, hjust = 1)) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette="RdYlBu")+
  ylab("Number of taxa that are assigned denovo names") + 
  theme(axis.title.x=element_blank())+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  facet_grid(Taxonomic_rank~., scales="free")
```



## Export data

```{r, eval=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
ggsave(filename="output/FigureS1.pdf", plot=p1, width=8, height=7, useDingbats=FALSE, limitsize=FALSE)
```
